channel.title: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn
channel.description: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn Mayor of Tampa (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: To Chairman Priebus and to my fellow Americans who have traveled from every corner of this great country to be in Tampa today, thank you for the honor to be hosting the 2012 Republican National Convention.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: Your faith and trust in us is much appreciated.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: Now, let me tell you about my city.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: We were built by people who worked hard and dreamed big.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: Immigrant families came here from Germany, Spain, Italy, and Cuba. They were cigar rollers and port workers.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: They were the economic engine that powered Tampa Bay.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: Today, we are a city that represents all that is good about America.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: We are leading Florida out of the recession. Unemployment is declining faster here than almost anywhere else.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: We are one of the fastest growing cities in the country.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: We've been called one of the best American cities to do business.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: We are attracting some of the brightest young people who want to be part of our tech industry.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: We are curing diseases -- on the cutting edge of science and health care. And, Tampa remains proud to be the home of MacDill Air Force Base - the headquarters of the United States Central Command and Special Operations Command.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: I can tell you with certainty that we are open for business and are ready to embrace all that the future holds.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: As mayor, I stand here today representing an extraordinary group of law enforcement, fire rescue personnel, and thousands of local volunteers. They have worked hard to make this convention a success.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: Each of them, proud Americans, excited to be part of the democratic process and eager to tell Tampa's story to the world.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: I trust you will fall in love with our city just as I do every day.
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn

item.title: Have a great week in Tampa!
item.author: The Hon. Bob Buckhorn
